song.title: From the Inside Out
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .C G D
[1] . C A thousand times I’ve failed . G D Still Your mercy remains . C And should I stumble again . G D I’m caught in Your grace
[p] . Em Everlasting . C G D Your light will shine when all else fades . Em Never ending . C G D Your glory goes beyond all fame
[C1] .C G In my heart and my soul . Em Lord I give You control . D Consume me from the inside out, Lord .C Em Let justice and praise . D Become my embrace . Am To love You from the inside out ---
[2] . C Your will above all else . G D My purpose remains . C The art of losing myself . G D In bringing You praise
[C2] . Em Everlasting . C G D Your light will shine when all else fades . Em Never ending . C G D Your glory goes beyond all fame . G C And the cry of my heart . D Em Is to bring You praise . C D From the inside out . C D Lord my soul cries out
